intro:
It's time for another sneaky all-nighter!
Play to your heart's content in all-new situations—just don't get caught!
description:
The exciting battle to stay up late returns!
Enjoy the simple yet satisfying thrills of pulling an all-nighter!
With a Joy-Con™ controller for each player, up to six players can join in the fun!
Time your moves carefully and rack up points without getting caught!

[Time Attack]
Compete for the fastest clear time and earn a top spot on the leaderboards!
Read the movements of the patrolling characters and find the right time to play!

[Battle]
Compete against friends or CPU-controlled opponents for the highest score!
Be bold and take risks to rack up the most points and win the game!
